system.description: WHEN YOU REACH OUTÂ to someone by letter or in person, reveal a significant new truth and roll the dice.

failure.label: Miss
failure.value:
On a miss your efforts are inneffective, misunderstood or
understood all too clearly.

partial.label: Partial Hit
partial.value:
Choose one:

  • Remove one harm each from you and your friend
  • Change the target and/or tone of a currently filled Regard slot
  • Add one to the mission pool

success.label: Full Hit!
success.value:
Choose two:

  • Remove one harm each from you and your friend
  • Change the target and/or tone of a currently filled Regard slot
  • Add one to the mission pool
